title: For easy creation of web photo galleries
content:
My friend Neven has just finished the new version of his [Isaac](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011131748/http:/mrgan.com/isaac) file and directory browser.   
It's a really handy tool for web photo galleries, even if you have them in multiple directories. No geekness required to configure it - all you have to do is edit 2 or 3 lines and drop it in your pictures dir.   
And it also lists other file types!   
   
Just spreading the word... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011131748im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
author: antiuser
